title: Ossian - Lelekero  2015  a2k
description:
Ossian is a long-standing Hungarian metal band, formed back in 1985 when vocalist Endre Paksi left PokolgÃƒÂ©p (another veteran Hungarian band) to form a new group. They have recorded rather steadily ever since their debut in 1988, with a few year's break in the late nineties (the band broke in 1994, and Paksi recruited a new lineup in 1998). As their lyrics are entirely in Hungarian, it's unlikely that this band has gotten a lot of exposure outside their homeland, but they have done well for themselves, with a style in the traditional 80's metal style (at times vaguely reminiscient of Scorpions or Iron Maiden, though Paksi's vocals resemble neither).
